tweet: Found a different route to work so I don’t sit in traffic on the highway. Saving SO much $ on gas!
Turned the gauge on my water heater to mid way: no need for it to be on full blast & I save loads of $ every month!
I am not a vegetarian because I love animals; I am a vegetarian because I hate plants.
Dampened a paper towel with apple cider vinegar, wrapped my big block of cheese in it & put it in a bag in the fridge. It’ll last longer!
Friendships last when each friend thinks he has a slight superiority over the other.
